quote.registrar: Computershare Hong Kong Investor Services Ltd.
quote.issuer_name: New Century Healthcare Holding Co. Ltd.
quote.nm: New Century Healthcare Holding Co. Ltd.
quote.summary: New Century Healthcare Holding Co Ltd is an investment holding company primarily engaged in the provision of pediatrics and obstetrics and gynecology specialty services. The Company operates four segments. The Pediatrics segment engages in the provision of pediatric services through Beijing New Century Children’s Hospital Co., Ltd. (BNC Children’s Hospital) and Beijing New Century Women’s and Children’s Hospital Co., Ltd. (BNC Women’s and Children’s Hospital) and other subsidiaries. The Obstetrics and Gynecology segment engages in the provision of obstetric and gynecologic services through BNC Women’s and Children’s Hospital and other subsidiaries. The Hospital Consulting Services segment engages in the provision of hospital consulting services. The Others segment engages in the operation of canteens, selling gifts and groceries in shops located in its own hospitals and other businesses. The Company conducts its business in the domestic market.
